definition.script:
stage 'Pre-deployment'
println "The pre-deplooyment stage is starting..." echo 'This one also works here in groovy'
String eth0 = 'ip addr show eth0'.execute().getText() String ip = eth0.split('inet ')[1].split(' brd')[0] println "I'm running in this IP: ${ip}"
git 'https://github.com/osic/devstack-lxc.git'
node('cas-agent'){ String ip = null }
